website_summaries.verdict: With an appealing lavender and grapefruit scent, Better Life’s concentrated, plant-based laundry detergent is 100% derived from plants.
pros: Can be used in high-efficiency machines or standard machines
Packaged using solar energy, with recyclable, biodegradable packaging
cons: Works best on only lightly soiled clothing
Thicker than average consistency can mean a slow pour

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural laundry detergent I have tried yet. Gets stains out, smells great, but the smell doesn't stay after drying (which is normal for natural scents) I use it for whites and colors and it keeps my colors bright. So far this is the only brand that has worked for me that is a 1 on the EWG. If you get the unscented I think it is lower, but I like the scent. For reference I live in Southern California and have horrible hard and chlorinated water and this works great for me! Finally found a winner after trying 5 other EWG recommended brands
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Better than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was traveling and my normal brand of Biokleen was unavailable in the smaller size. This smells great and after the first few uses I'm very happy with the overall performance. Didn't cause any break outs(sensitive skin users). I don't know this companies environmental rating(or grade) or their use of recycled materials in their line. For the price and performance this is a great buy. Will use again if my brand is unavailable. I would recommend to those looking for a laundry eco solution.
customer_reviews.author: Travis H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as ewg makes it out to be.
customer_reviews.text: Due to use of coconut oil it's think soap, very messy and hard to pour. Over powering smell in bottle, leaves clothes smelling funny. Due to use of coconut oil very fun allergies to use of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Gets Farmer Joe’s Clothes Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is the bomb! My husband is a farmer and he gets everything on his work clothes! I was really impressed with this detergent. It’s very concentrated and seems to lift a lot of stains and odors out that other detergents don’t. I was really impressed. I have found my new detergent for his horrendous work clothes!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Cleans clothes, smells great, all natural
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and it has natural ingredients. I have dogs and their bedding gets stinky sometimes; this gets out the smell and doesn’t leave any harsh chemicals behind. I use it to wash everything - towels, bed sheets, clothes, etc. It,s very concentrated and lasts a long time. I’m very happy with this detergent, and I just bought my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, think shipping needs to be done differently
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! It’s not too harsh of a smell and it gets things clean. I use this to wash my newborns clothes in. The one thing I hate is that every time I order a Better Life Product it gets delivered and some of the product has leaked out. Legit EVERY TIME! It feels like almost a waste because I’ve then lost some of what I’ve paid for. As much as I love their products I’m not sure I want to deal with soap and detergent spilling everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Leal

customer_reviews.title: Good for lighter loads
customer_reviews.text: I wish this worked well for me, but it didn’t. It unfortunately didn’t get stains out and some garments had to be washed twice to get scents out of them, I think it would work well for lighter loads but when you have a 2 and a 4 year old there’s no such thing as lighter loads
customer_reviews.author: Green_Eyed_Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Terrific detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent, which I originally bought because it’s SLS free and suitable for my HE washer, is terrific. Just a little bit gets a load clean and fresh. I love the scent. It’s not overpowering, but it is really pleasant. When the clothes dry, I don’t really smell it, so it’s mostly just a nice boost when doing the wash. I’ll continue ordering this product. It’s a winner.
customer_reviews.author: MyLikeIt

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I swear I wanted to love this detergent but I just couldn’t get myself to. For starters? The detergent came leaking in the package. I’m sure it was Amazon’s fault though- not the actual company. When I washed a load of laundry I noticed that it has a very strong smell. It doesn’t smell bad, but it is quite strong. Also it doesn’t get stains out the way I wanted it to. I really really really wanted to like this since it’s natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! A natural product that smells great too!
customer_reviews.text: Our families clothes smell wonderful and look even better! We are very impressed by the lasting scent. After trying multiple natural detergents and finding they seem to all have one thing in common; they smell bad. NOT this one! Better life knew what they were doing with this scent and we are so thankful they did! We found our new detergent! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning without nasty chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive skin and this hasn't caused any eczema flareups. It smells great, cleans comparably to the Tide pods I used to use, and is a good price compared to Seventh Generation or similar. Plus, it got a great rating on EWG.
customer_reviews.author: Ereioi

customer_reviews.title: EWG scores it an A
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as any "green" product can for its purpose. Gets a good score (an A) from Environmental Working Group. Because I live with an incurable cancer, safety of cleaning products is my top priority. Sometimes this requires extra effort to clean really tough dirt/stains, but most of my laundry is not tough. I like this product and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We buy this all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I use this detergent for me and my husbands laundry A little goes a long way, it really does clean well and eliminates odors. It is a bit pricy but I definitely appreciate the free of parabens and dyes this detergent offers. So it is worth it for me! EWG approves means our household approves!
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: The scent was fine, out of the bottle and in the wash but was lost after clothes were dry. On heavy duty loads had to add ammonia to get rid of perspiration odor. Very dissatisfied. Will probably go back to using ECOS or All free & clear.
customer_reviews.author: JanG-P

customer_reviews.title: It needs to be back on prime.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product especially since it is sulfate free as I have an allergy to sulfates so I had to switch all soaps and detergents. I've been buying this for months then all of the sudden they switch to third party sellers only for $28 plus shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Detergent Leaked all over box and other items:(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my detergent came with other orders in one box. I was able to wipe everything down and not need to return, but my detergent bottle had spilled out and wasted half of the bottle! There is no option to get a refund or new one without returning the damaged product, and because it was such a mess, I am not reshipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a detergent that would be safe for baby clothes, this was an A on EWG, so I went ahead with it. I am overall very pleased with it! I only gave it 4 stars because once it goes through a wash there was not a lavender smell, that being said, it still gave the clothing an amazingly clean fresh smell. It seems to clean well and the clothes felt so soft afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Raegraves

customer_reviews.title: Great soap if you're chemical conscious.
customer_reviews.text: works best with warm water and leaves are clothes smelling great. It may not get stains out the first time but a second wash in warm water usually gets the job done. Not harsh for a clothing and safe for our newborn baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling. Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling. Cleans very well. A few of my workout shirts had smelled funky for a while, and nothing we tried would help. This is the first thing that's been able to take the funk away! Love it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle less than full.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order of two bottles. One bottle is full 1/2 inch down from bottle cap. The other bottle appears to be partially used as it’s fill is down 2 inches from the cap. The lid on the low fill was loose, however there was no spillage inside the shipping box. One corner of the box had been broken from top to bottom and taped over to repair that corner. I’m not satisfied to receive a bottle that is less than full.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nurse Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Watch price on product before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, cleans ok but you have to watch the price on this item. It continues to increase. Deliberate cookie tracking smh
customer_reviews.author: C London

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent, very concentrated
customer_reviews.text: I really love this as a detergent it cleans effectively. I bought it for my newborn but ended up using it regularly for everyone's clothes. I dislike the smell because I feel like the clothes just ends up smelling like coconut oil, so i add essential oils. I also put vinegar and essential oils in the rinse cycle instead of fabric softener. A little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: PandaMom

customer_reviews.title: Sticky residue but great scent
customer_reviews.text: After researching the most eco-friendly detergent out there (thanks to Environmental Working Group) I found this detergent. I so very much wanted to like it but I find that it leaves my clothing very sticky even if I use less than 1/2 a cap full. I end up having to wash my clothing 3x to get the stickiness of the detergent off my clothing. This is a lot of wasted water, which in some ways defeats the point of buying an eco-friendly detergent to begin with. Anyone else have this issue? If I am doing something wrong, let me know! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Altman

customer_reviews.title: Love It !!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy a retail free and clear detergent and add Lavender or tea tree oil. I don't like synthetic fragrances at all. This detergent leaves my laundry really clean and fresh without a perfume smell. I've had this bottle for at least a month. You really only need a tiny bit per load
customer_reviews.author: T. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty big on chemical free or limiting the amount we allow in our home products. The scent is meh, the cleaning power is okay. I added some Young Living cleaner to it and was able to get better results.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLEE C. BARRETT

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick!
customer_reviews.text: Its getting the clothes clean so that's a plus. It's also much thicker than any detergent I've felt in a while. The smell does not permeate the clothes (which I actually like to smell my detergent) it's very faint. My only concern is that I feel the bottle is too small for our family size (5) so we'd end up spending too much to keep this one going. Other than the size for our size family I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn B.

customer_reviews.title: No toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: This is good for babies because there are no toxic chemicals inside and i like the natural lavender smell. As my baby is very little, I am not sure how well this could wash dirty clothes but I overall love it and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kryskhloe

customer_reviews.title: Recommended as environmentally alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin and no synthetic scents. Environmentally safe and cleans well. Lavender scent is light and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Natural detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love natural products and this detergent smells nice however since it doesn’t have any harmful chemicals, some clothes still don’t smell when dried as nice as the detergent it self. Anyway, very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn College

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders, safe for family and environmental friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this detergent. I was desperately looking for something not only healthier for my kids and husband, but also for the environment. I love that this product. My clothes our clean and it’s a natrul smell, which my husband loves (especially with his allergies). I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mareissa

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent for those with allergies.
customer_reviews.text: Good detergent for those with allergies. However, it does not work as well as Tide. So, I add vinegar as a booster.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and was looking for an SLS Free product. This is a great detergent. It seems to get close clean. I wish it was a bit more fragrant though. I know there is a fine line between scented and irritating, but there is no fresh smell to the clothing afterward. I'll still use it though because it definitely is better for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: We bought this detergent for our newborn. We've used it since she was born (she's now 10 months) and love it. The smell is perfect - not too weak but not too strong. It is great for her skin; she has never broken out. Seems to clean her clothes well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris + Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Better Life and laundry soap is great. You need very little and cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works, but very thick so a little hard to pour.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Will be sticking with this from now on, it's amazing. Washes so good AND rinses so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: F. euGene A.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This product is derived from plants, is bio-degradable, and works great. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: William Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me about this product. Safe to the environment. Great product. Really clean your clothes and remove stubborn stains.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Sulfate free and works great.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very concentrated so you don’t have to use much. I’m very satisfied with the brightness and softness of my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Smell is awful
customer_reviews.text: Smell is awful but did seem to do ok job cleaning and did not irritate my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: It cleans stains well. Beautiful scent that does not overpower. Best thing is it’s safe for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Phinn

customer_reviews.title: How can I return it?
customer_reviews.text: How are we expected to return the leaking detergent for a refund back? The item arrived all leaking and now I am supposed to pack it and spend time so I can get the money back?
customer_reviews.author: Sheetal Chadha

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great, delivery/return- not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and have been using it for months. I ordered it a few months ago and it arrived busted. The soap got everywhere in the box and I tossed it. I have been trying to get either a replacement or refund with no success because they want me to mail back the item. Unfortunately, I had already tossed it- and how could I mail back a broken, messy container of spilled soap anyway???
customer_reviews.author: Luke N.

customer_reviews.title: Plant 🌱 based laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with how this product keeps my clothes clean . No real strong scent which i love
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Great price, excellent laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Best natural laundry detergent on the market. Great price and really lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Natalie K

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not full
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I received was not full- even when compared to the picture (which is also not full). Is this a mistake or are they all like this? Disappointing since it’s supposed to be concentrated!
customer_reviews.author: rgrin

customer_reviews.title: TWICE arrived leaking. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.text: Product great. Delivery/packing terrible. Oozing everywhere b/c bottle top cracked two times in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Great natural detergent
customer_reviews.text: As efficient as generic brand on the market. Great aromatic smell. Love it and will repurchase it
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money/ great company!
customer_reviews.text: Best detergent with safe and clean ingredients I’ve tried yet!! Love the smell...cleans really well!
customer_reviews.author: Clean Living Mom | Meredith Chandler

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells fantastic. I insist on using a clear detergent but ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells fantastic. I insist on using a clear detergent but I've always preferred that they also have a scent. Many clear detergents are fragrance-free which I don't like. I love how this smells and I love the price. A+
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: It smells good and seems to get the laundry clean
customer_reviews.text: I li ke it. It smells good and seems to get the laundry clean. I especially like the fact that it's not full of icky, unhealthy indgredients. I'll probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love EVERY product from Better Life! Bought this in place of the usual baby soap and loved it so much we now wash everything with it. A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: It smells great and cleans well. I found I used less soap then I do with Meyers or other 'natural' brands.
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Concentrated and works good on removing Strong smells from clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad F.

customer_reviews.title: Order was canceled including its subscription
customer_reviews.text: Order was canceled including its subscription please remove from billing Thank you Delmo
customer_reviews.author: Delmo Moura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fragrance of this soap after dried and cleans my clothes well! A must and have order twice!
customer_reviews.author: marge martin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is the only detergent I will use for my infant's clothes. Smells great and does a good job!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great. Don't need a lot in your washer. Wish there was more product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bodiemonster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that tiny capful actually cleans a whole load. Love this stuff! Super fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Zebraski

customer_reviews.title: 4x expensive for amount received. Spills in transit
customer_reviews.text: Detergent is over priced. Is only one smaller bottle than the store size. Can't use just one small cap full like they say. Questions section even says was fir more than one bottle of soap. It's 4x the cost not 4x the soap. Totally misleading that it's for 1 container. On top of cost 1/3 spilt in route to inside plastic bags. Tops never stay on in shipping in this brand. Other cleaners n soaps all come in plastic for spillage, yeah should be glad they bag it. Maybe should fix caps so They don't leak every time Won't buy again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cr54

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: The scent isn’t strong at all and it’s done it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! So glad it’s back in stock on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my clothes and didn't fade the darks at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: love love love this product! Only need a small amount. Laundry comes out very clean with a fresh natural scent.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: The smell wasn't that impressive either I prefer myers baby blossom much better. I won't be buying this again
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this item upon receiving it was wrapped in a plastic bag. Closer inpection I see that laundry detergent was all over the bag had to wash the bottle! However the cap was tight could be that it spilled and the cap was closed afterwards. The smell wasn't that impressive either I prefer myers baby blossom much better. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: BEST natural laundry detergent on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many natural laundry detergents. I have even made my own and nothing really makes my clothes smell or seem clean. This stuff is a game changer. My clothes really smell and seem cleaner. I will be sticking with this for life! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our whole household!
customer_reviews.text: We have a few with sensitive skin in our home so I always refer to EWG.org for our products to get a "safe" stamp. This product removes a huge amount of toddler and infant stains and manages to clean adult manual labor smells too. I'm really pleased with the way this detergent cleans the clothes for our entire family. Sometimes "natural" products just don't clean well, no matter the brand. This is a powerhouse in the safe ingredients world.
customer_reviews.author: MommyOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Like all of the Better Life products
customer_reviews.text: Like all of the Better Life products, this stuff works better than anything else I've tried, and on it's own- I don't add fabric softener, bleach, nothing. I typically like the natural stuff, like Mrs. Meyers, BioKleen, Ecos, etc. so I'm not comparing this against Tide or Gain or anything. But from my experience, this gets things cleaner, leaves no static, things are soft, they smell good, and that's that. And you use just a tiny bit because it's so concentrated. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Good green product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after trying few other cleaning products of the same brand like floor cleaner and all-purpose cleaner. It cleans fine with hot and warm cycles (I did not try this product with the cold water yet). By performance, I would say it is an average soap. By ingredients, I would say it is a superior formula. This product contains no harsh chemicals and all the ingredients are rated as safe by ewg.org. It is a bit pricy, but it is really worth it if you want to eliminate dangerous chemicals from your laundry room. Overall, I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

customer_reviews.title: And the great thing is is that it works really well
customer_reviews.text: I adore their products!! I'm incredibly allergic to most conventional home cleaning products. I am able to use this without any headaches, nausea and rashes. And the great thing is is that it works really well! We even use it to clean our cloth diapers. I love reducing toxins in our life's and better life helps make that a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well. Repurchasing.
customer_reviews.text: I've been through quite a few of the green brands in search of one that impresses. This hits the mark, so much so that I'm re-ordering today. I have an active family that includes two kids ages 10 and 5, so I need a detergent that can deliver, and this one does. Bright colors and whites, good lifting power. Tackles biking clothes, gym clothes and soccer clothes with aplomb. The fragrance is a bit strong in the wash but basically undetectable once the clothes are dry. My daughter has very sensitive skin and hasn't had any issue or flare-ups with this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, environmentally-friendlier choice.
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about this product. It leaves my clothes clean and fresh-smelling. I am trying to reduce my overall environmental impact, but castille soap alone was not cleaning my clothes well, so I did some research and this product does have less harmful ingredients to the environment (and potentially to us). I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Makes laundry smell terrible
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this laundry soap, I have been trying more natural ways to wash clothes and this is not it. The laundry smells terrible after being washed and doesn't look for feel clean at all. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product cause I love their cleaning products. This does not clean the clothes nor get smells out of the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Breezer

customer_reviews.title: Every product from Better Life has been a home run
customer_reviews.text: I try to buy as much natural products as possible. Every product from Better Life has been a home run! This is a great laundry detergent, smells great- not over powering, and my clothes come out clean and fresh. highly recommed
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes! No stains, no perfumes
customer_reviews.text: We love this laundry detergent! It's probably all I will use from now on. For an extra dirty load I still add oxyclean, but this tuff takes care of pretty much everything with a 4 year old and a puppy! The smell is light and pleasant while washing, but, after drying, there is no detectable smell!! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nikhanj

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on the recommendation from a friend and I really like the cleaning power. My towels are fluffier! The fragrance is not strong and I have sensitive skin which wasn't irritated.
customer_reviews.author: ELLE H

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling detergent with great ratings
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling detergent with great ratings! It leaves my clothes clean and crisp looking. I wish there was a way that the smell could last through the dryer process. I am only giving this 4 stars because I get this through subscribe and save, and the price went up almost $4 since the last one I bought 2 months ago!
customer_reviews.author: SWoFNP

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it and it was ok. Nothing really wowed me about it. I was looking for a more natural detergent but I am moving on to a different brand after using this.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells good, is free of harsh chemicals and gets my mechanics clothes clean! I'm gonna use this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The only laundry detergent I use. I have sensitive skin and have no problems with this. Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: yetilive

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this laundry detergent over Tide, All and many others for normal clothing wear. Very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many natural detergents and I think we found one we love. I don’t use less because of the high concentration. That could be our water. I really like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Shika

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t leave a good smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it has less harmful chemicals but it doesn’t leave your clothes smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. The lavender scent is light, and sadly because it is a natural scent, does not last through the heat of the drying process. Maybe when the weather is warmer and I can hang them outside it will still smell yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Alison

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A safe laundry detergent to clean our clothes without the chemicals that are bad for us and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: I love this laundry detergent it works great it gets rid ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent it works great it gets rid of stains it's worth the money and it seems it last for a long time I just wish Amazon will keep selling it
customer_reviews.author: Uniquestyles

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING NATURAL DETERGENT
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used so many different natural detergents and this one is my favorite. It gets super dirty clothes clean and the lavender scent is natural, not an artificial fragrance that gives me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: KelliE

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Gets clothes clean and is non toxic. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Seems to get the clothes pretty clean. Divine smell that smells natural not chemical
customer_reviews.text: Seems to get the clothes pretty clean. Divine smell that smells natural not chemical, and is detectable but subtle after clothes are dry. Has not irritated sensitive skin (or sensitive dog). Have even started using the same brand of dryer sheets to make the scent stronger and last longer, love them too!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: I love better life products. Not only are they natural but they work very very well. Often they are cheaper than seventh gen products
customer_reviews.author: Ryan hale

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Isn't Heavily Scented
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well but disappointed that the detergent smell doesn't carry over into the clothes as much as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry detergent I've found!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it work great unlike all the other all natural laundry detergents I've tried it smells wonderful. And if you're a busy momma or daddy sometimes you forget the laundry in the washing machine. This stuff doesn't get that nasty musty smell like other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Eli & Miranda Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Plant based wonder!
customer_reviews.text: so good to know I’m using something that isn’t chemical ridden for my family and I.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka d

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good and doesnt leave a residue on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans pretty well, though my husband had an allergic reaction to something in it. I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just try it you will be happy you
customer_reviews.text: got out stains and dirt that other detergents had trouble with. Just try it you will be happy you did
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Clean and safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry detergent. Cleans clothes well and I love the smell. It's gentle enough to use on my infants clothes.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: No frills gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Can't say too much about a product that delivers. No regrets, it's in my subscriptions.
customer_reviews.author: C. HAdams

customer_reviews.title: Clean laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! (Their dish soap is great too.) Seems to clean the laundry well without leaving residue or smell-very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Better Life Natural Concentrated Laundry Detergent, Lavender Grapefruit, 64 loads
product_meta.description: Size:64 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Lavender Grapefruit Liquid Laundry Detergent
